testcase.name: Number of friends retreival from a web service
testcase.system-out: When the user sends GET request.............................................passed Then the user should get requested information with status code "200" and number of friends of "258".passed

testcase.name: Email HomeTown retreival from a web service
testcase.system-out: When the user sends request to get email and hometown.......................passed Then the user should get requested information with "rusi21@rambler.ru" and "Naryn".passed

testcase.name: Login Credentials
testcase.system-out: When the home page opens enter user credentials.............................passed

testcase.name: search for hotel
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................passed When the user enters location "Chicago, IL, United States" and selects rewards program "Amazon.com Gift Card".passed And the user selects start date "05/01/2019" and end date "05/29/2019"......passed And the user selects number of guests "1 Guest" and number of rooms "1 Room".passed And the user clicks search..................................................passed Then the user should see results "accept" for "Chicago, IL, United States" and "Amazon.com Gift Card".passed

testcase.name: search for hotel 2
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................passed When the user enters location "New York City, NY, United States" and selects rewards program "Uber".passed And the user selects start date "06/20/2019" and end date "06/25/2019"......passed And the user selects number of guests "2 Guests" and number of rooms "2 Rooms".passed And the user clicks search..................................................passed Then the user should see results "accept" for "New York City, NY, United States" and "Uber".passed

testcase.name: search for hotel 3
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................passed When the user enters location "Augusta, ME, USA" and selects rewards program "Aeroplan".passed And the user selects start date "07/09/2019" and end date "07/17/2019"......passed And the user selects number of guests "3 Guests" and number of rooms "3 Rooms".passed And the user clicks search..................................................passed Then the user should see results "accept" for "Augusta, ME, USA" and "Aeroplan".passed
